description:
Having finally awoken, Takashi returns to his ordinary life where he finds Asuka waiting for him. While on their way home together, Asuka invites Takashi up to her room. Once there, Takashi reveals he is not from this world, but from the kingdom of Gretagard. Hearing Takashi`s confession, Asuka shows him the truth.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Are You Familiar with the Concept of Little Sister Moe?
Imouto Moe to Iu Gainen o Shitte Iruka?
妹萌えという概念を知っているか?
